import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; import "./sidebar.css"; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom"; function Sidebar() { let role = localStorage.getItem("admin"); const [isSignedOut, setSignedOut] = useState(false); const [isAdmin, setIsAdmin] = useState(role); const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); //store token in localStorage let handleSignOut = () => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/logout", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization: "Bearer " + token, }, }).then((response) => { if (response.ok) { setSignedOut(true); localStorage.clear(); } }); }; if (isSignedOut) { return ; } return ( <> {/* SideBar component */} {/* Sidebar Logo */}
{/* ProTracker */} {/* Sidebar Menu */}
